analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#113-114) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#211-247)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#327-349)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#420-435)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#439-456)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#520-524) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#260-278):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#275-276)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#277)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#551-566) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#563-566)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#487) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#528-531)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#520-524)
	- /unique_chucks/23/0xedc1936bbe9fee2abc523ad237aa62a3a3722177.sol#522-524
